title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 224.2 - Specifications and test procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 224.2 - Specifications and test procedures

State Regulations

Except as otherwise provided in this Part, the specifications
and test procedures referred to in this Part shall be those set forth in
ASTM. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
224.2

Amended

New

York State Register November 20, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 47, eff. 11/20/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
